title: Small body of still water
creator_credit: Dietmar Fill, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: A pond is a small body of still water. Within this environment the life support elements of sun, water and oxygen enable the process of photosynthesis to take place, upon which much of the life in and around the pond is dependent.
creator_credit_for_label: Dietmar Fill, Don Murray and Film Australia
